titles.title: Congratulating the University of Illinois Fighting Illini men's tennis team for its successful season.
Congratulating the University of Illinois Fighting Illini men's tennis team for its successful season.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.
Mr. McKeon moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)
Congratulates the University of Illinois Fighting Illini men's tennis team, coach Craig Tiley, and associate head coach Bruce Berque on winning the 2003 NCAA team championship.
